name: D.O.N.U.T Fighter
description:
Invaders from D.I.E.T. are here.

D.O.N.U.T. is our last hope.

To the Skies!

Made in less than 24 hours as an entry for Mini Jam 56.

Gamepad is recommended.

Keyboard controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Shield / Charge cannon

X - Boost

Terrain tiles from Itchabop's 8-Bit Overworld Tileset.

Everything else by Matt Kimball.
